title: FS T213-2 Jack Warhop NY - SGC 40
author: TistaT202

posts.post_title: FS T213-2 Jack Warhop NY - SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Nice card for the grade.  Vibrant colors and minimal creasing (scan does not do card justice).  The line to the right of the card on the scan is not there, it is from the scanner.  SGC 35 of same card recently sold on eBay for $75.  I am looking for $80. S/H in bubble mailer included in price.  Prefer PP F&F but regular PP ok as well.  ([url]mcantista@gmail.com[/url]).  Please respond via PM only.   Thanks, Mike.

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/NY%20Amer%20T-Cards/WarhopT213-2reverse-1.jpg[/IMG]
